title: CharactersFontFoundry
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Characters Font Foundry**

Founded by [ReneVerkaart](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ReneVerkaart) in 2004, [Characters Font Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/) is an independent Dutch type foundry, designing and selling high quality public- and commisioned typefaces. CFF fonts have been used for corporate identities, websites and packaging.

Besides being a self-taught type designer, René Verkaart is the co-founder of [Stoere Binken Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.stoerebinken.nl/), a renowned Dutch graphic design studio based in Maastricht, The Netherlands.

**Fonts**  
 [Accelerator](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=accelerator), [Ballet Mechanique](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=balletmechanique), [Bionix](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/), [BorVer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/), [Cucaracha](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=cucaracha), [Encrypted Wallpaper](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=encryptedwallpaper), [FatBoy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=fatboy), [Freaky Animals](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/), [Insider](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=insider), [Kryptonite](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=kryptonite), [Nantua](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=nantua), [Nantua Flava XL](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=nantuaflava), [Nordic A](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=nordica), [Nordic Narrow](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=nordicnarrow), [Plan A, B, C](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=plan), [Porta](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=porta), [Reethi Rah](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=reethirah), [SBD Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=sbdblock), [SBD Block Cutout](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=sbdblock), [Shell Shock](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=shellshock), [Shell Shock Cloak](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=shellshock), [Siventi Logo + Icono](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=siventi) and [Vagebond Condensed / Normal / Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/index.html?font=vagebond).

**Address**  
Statensingel 199  
NL 6211-PR Maastricht  
The Netherlands  
 [info@characters.nl](mailto:info@characters.nl)  
 [http://www.characters.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.characters.nl/ "http://www.characters.nl")

 [Like me and I like you](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.facebook.com/pages/Characters-Font-Foundry/152467264800443)

**Twitter**

**FlickR**  
Check out Fonts in Use, sketches and other interesting type things on [FlickR](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/characters/)

Characters Font Foundry is a brand of [Creative Holding B.V.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003358/http:/www.creativeholding.nl/)
